Title: Night Must Fall
Cast: Merle Tottenham, Kathleen Harrison, Dame May Whitty, Rosalind Russell, Eily Malyon, Matthew Boulton, Robert Montgomery, Beryl Mercer, Alan Marshal, Winifred Harris, E.E. Clive
Plot: When a rich but cantankerous dowager on an isolated estates hires an engaging handyman, her niece/companion becomes suspicious of his motives. Crotchety old Mrs. Bransom hires a charming young man named Danny as a live-in companion. Less charmed by Danny is Mrs. Bransom's niece, Olivia, a repressed young woman who suspects Danny of foul play. When news of a local murder is revealed, Olivia suspects Danny. Although repulsed by the thought he may have committed the crime, Olivia also finds herself becoming increasingly attracted to him at the same time. Written by Daniel Bubbeo <dbubbeo@cmp.com>
Location: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios - 10202 W. Washington Blvd., Culver City, California, USA
Actors: Merle Tottenham, Kathleen Harrison, Dame May Whitty
Writer: Emlyn Williams (from the stage success of), John Van Druten (screen play)
